title: CREST

## Description

Repository for EMNLP 2020 paper, Bootstrapped Q-learning with Context Relevant Observation Pruning to Generalize in Text-based Games. `Subhajit Chaudhury, Daiki Kimura, Kartik Talamadupula, Michiaki Tatsubori, Asim Munawar, Ryuki Tachibana. "Bootstrapped Q-learning with Context Relevant Observation Pruning to Generalize in Text-based Games", Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP), 2020`.

## Main Contributors

Subhajit Chaudhury
